summary: Taeko is a stressed career woman who leaves her life in the city for an island vacation. The vacation does not become what she expected as everyone on the island is strange.
cast: Satomi Kobayashi|Mikako Ichikawa|Ryô Kase|Ken Mitsuishi|Masako Motai|Hiroko Yakushimaru|Ken|Yukiko Tachibana
title: Megane
